text:
It would be much better if you and I were in therapy. We would have a greater chance of success if that was possible, but she says you are not able to
do that so we can’t. Hence the current plan. But you won’t try.
We are not doing the best thing for anyone. We are only doing the best thing you are capable of. I’d like to try and do more, and will do it with a
professional. Hell, I’ll even let Dr Brown do it. What do you think?
Message 1637 of 4024
Why are you even bringing it up?? It makes me sick. You use it to humiliate and traumatize me.
Your track record is you do share it with anyone that will listen when you feel wronged or angry.
You brought it up to your entire family when I discovered your affair all those years ago. It was a false narrative to get them to think I somehow
condoned your behaviour or you were confused. Every single one as your excuse. You screamed it to John and Lisa. You have never been a gentleman
about it  and the feedback to me was one of disgust that you would share that. It’s disgusting.
You  brought it up with Elsa.
You have a demonstrated history and pattern. It’s disgusting.
It is humiliating to have that shared and you weaponized it. You weaponized everything that why I stopped doing anything with you that could
remotely be used and weaponized against me.
I will just share that when you do share those details, people think badly of you that you would try humiliate me versus your intended goal of trying to
make you the victim or pity on you. If you think people think I’m the crazy one, just think if you were listening to someone share such intimate details
about their partner at the time. It would be one of betrayal and disgust.
The same will hold true when we step into mediation and your story of not being employed for a year while I bust my ass, manage the kids full time
while you bombard me with crazy and create unsafe condition s that require you to physically leave the state. Documented 100 plus unanswered calls
and texts repeatedly. Everyone in those rooms will be holding down a full time job, while you complain of having a partner leave you after 25 years of
alcoholism and DV. Let’s see how much sympathy that generates.
Sent:02/25/2024 at 09:56 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/25/2024 at 09:57 PM)
Subject:Re: Domestic Abuse
Message 1638 of 4024
I can’t submit your insurance claims. That is documented and I have told you repeatedly.
Sent:02/25/2024 at 09:57 PM
From:Christine Moyer
